name: The Renaissance
description:
You are an employee that works creating and fixing animatronics. The only problem is that your "friend" decided to punish you in the worst way possible. There are animatronics approaching to your room. You have to be very aware of them. They could kill you! This is a horror game inspired by FNAF made by a SOLO game dev. Its my first game. If you find out some bugs or something like that, you can comment and I will try to fix it as soon as possible. Please donate if you like the game. It really helps me to keep working and creating games. :]

You can download the setup or the zip file:
